attributes.description:
This Land Cruiser is a must see. Extremely well looked after with full service history and low kms. Comes with E/Windows, Air-con, Alarm/Immobilizer, Telefunken touch screen media player, Speaker door panels fitted with KICKER 6x9 Speakers, AUX and USB ports, CAPVIRI seat and Dash covers, 3inch Free-flow exhaust system, ARB front bumper with light bar and fog lights, Double bin liners with rubberizing, Brand new spare wheel, 2 x 90L fuel tanks, Roll-bar, Tow-bar with step, Running boards and Alloy mag wheels with Bighorn Maxxis M/T tyres,

Finance can be arranged, contact me for application form or to view.

All vehicles sold with 1 month/1500kms warranty OR 2 year mechanical breakdown warranty as optional.

All trade ins welcome

Theos Bakkie Sales
73 Van Riebeeck Rd (next to Nandos)
Kuilsriver
Cape Town
